title: Accurate Modeling of the Potential Energy Surface of Molecular Clusters Boosted by Neural Networks
content:

The computational cost of accurate quantum chemistry (QC) calculations of large molecular systems can often be unbearably high. Machine learning offers a lower computational cost compared to QC methods while...
